originalText.text: I made an appointment through Zocdoc, and one of the customer care representatives called me to get the information; however, during the call, while I tried to give her the information when we reached the stage of giving her the address, I told her that I was from Newark city. She asked me to stay on the line, and suddenly she hung up the line; I waited for a few minutes, and I thought she might be going to call back; then I tried to call back the same number to explain what is happened. Another customer care representative I spoke to has not even apologized for what had happened, and she was so rude. A lesson that should be taught to them ever never to judge people among their color of ethnicity or color. I was about to continue with your schedule, and depending on the discussion that we had that this place they are looking for money rather than providing fair treatment. However, for those who would like to know more, you can read the other people's reviews in Google maps and Zocdoc. I hope the clinic will consider my comment to improve the quality of the customer care representatives.

originalText.text: I was sliced, cut open, and left with a mark that is right in the middle of my face. Zero concern for my well-being, nothing that was done to me was necessary. I paid 800 to gain some confidence and was sliced open, these pictures are from 7 months after “Jennifer “ decided to cut my open and stitch me like a rag doll. They didn’t spend more than 2 seconds before slicing me. My life is destroyed, all because I wanted to get some teen scars looked at.

They didn’t spend more than 2 seconds before slicing me. My life is destroyed, all because I wanted to get some teen scars looked at.

originalText.text: Marmur Medical is by far one of the best dermatology offices I've ever been to. I just recently had Mohs Surgery with Dr. Berliner and I can't rave more about her. Her bedside manor, personality and expertise really helped calm me during the procedure. She explained everything that she was doing during the procedure and made sure I was comfortable. This was my first time having Mohs Surgery, and I'm so happy that I went to Marmur Medical!

originalText.text: Very positive experience with the Physicians's assistant Laura.   Felt the pathologist bill for the biopsy was usurious and absolutely outrageous.   Shame on Mr. Sinai Dermatphology for their absurd billing practices.

originalText.text: Clean and neat office. Close to the train station. Staff is great!
